Package com.bluecreation.melodysmart

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BatteryService.Listener
    Class used to report the application or module accessing a MelodySmart device about changes in the Battery service.
    BondingListener
    This class is used to report to tell the application when bonding starts and finishes
    DataService.Listener
    Class used to report the application or module accessing a MelodySmart device about changes in the MelodySmart service.
    DeviceInfoService.Listener
    Class used to report the application or module using the MelodySmart library about information read on the Device Information Service in a remote MelodySmart device.
    I2CService.Listener
    Class used to report the application or module accessing a MelodySmart device about changes in the I2C service.
    ImageManagerListener
    Interface used to report the application or the component using the MelodySmart library about events related with querying and downloading new MelodySmart OTAU images
    MelodySmartListener
    Interface used to report about changes and events in the MelodySmart service.
    OtauListener
    Interface used to report the application or the component using the MelodySmart library about changes that concern the OTAU.
    RemoteCommandsService.Listener
    Class used to report the application or module accessing a MelodySmart device about changes in the I2C service.
    ServiceListener
    Generic interface used by the services in MelodySmart to report the application about connections, changes, etc.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatteryService
    This class is meant to access the Battery Service associated to a MelodySmart remote device.
    BLEError
    This class is assembles a set of known errors and their human readable descriptions.
    BluetoothLeService
    Service for managing connection and data communication with a GATT server hosted on a given Bluetooth LE device.
    DataService
    Service used to exchange data from and to a remote MelodySmart device.
    DeviceDatabase
    The Device Database stores some key values for known devices which are needed during the over-the-air upgrades
    DeviceDatabase.DeviceData  
    DeviceInfoService
    This class provides an interface to access the Device Information Service in a remote MelodySmart device.
    I2CService
    Interface with the I2C service in MelodySmart
    ImageManager
    ImageManager provides the functionality to list and download the official MelodySmart OTAU images as well as to prepare a raw image with the correct bluetooth address and XtalTrim parameters before it is downloaded to a remote device
    LEService
    Generic service used all the Services in MelodySmart extend
    MelodySmartDevice
    This is the main class for accessing the core functionalities of the MelodySmart library.
    NotificationsIssueWorkaround
    This class implements a workaround for a known issue.
    OtauRelease
    Contains all the necessary information to download a MeldoySmart OTAU image as well as some extra information about that image.
    OtauStatus
    Represents an OTAU state
    RemoteCommandsService
    Interface with the remote commands service in MelodySmart
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BLEError.Type  
    DeviceInfoService.INFO_TYPE
    Types of information that can be accessed on the DeviceInfoService
    OtauStatus.Error  
    OtauStatus.Result
